backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing announcements, events, staff, gallery, settings, and admin bootstrap with access control and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing build/deploy features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including admin pages, hooks, deployment scripts, and documentation.
frontend/deploy-logs/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the deploy-logs directory exists in version control.
Guide explaining how to capture and share full deployment logs for debugging.
frontend/docs/deploy/retry-deploy.md: Runbook detailing prerequisites and step-by-step instructions for re-running the full build and deployment process.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base defining global OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing root mount div and script loader for the frontend app.
frontend/scripts/retry-deploy.sh: Script performing dependency install, backend binding generation, frontend build, and canister deployment.
frontend/scripts/run-deploy-with-full-lo: Wrapper script executing the retry deploy script while capturing full logs to a timestamped file.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring all site and admin routes with theming and router provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Authorization gate component enforcing admin access with login prompts, bootstrap flow, and principal display.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that uses Internet Identity to authenticate and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Client-side contact form with validation, submission state, and a demo success message.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying site links, contact info from settings, and a branded attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with navigation, admin link, login button, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper combining header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/state/ErrorSecti: Reusable error alert component with customizable title and message.
frontend/src/components/state/LoadingSec: Skeleton-based loading placeholder rendering multiple content blocks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContent.ts: Admin-focused hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting announcements, events, and staff profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the authenticated caller is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerPrincipalTex: Fetches the caller’s principal text from the backend with identity fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstAdminBootstra: Manages first-admin bootstrap availability and triggers the bootstrap process.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicContent.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch public content—announcements, events, staff, gallery, and settings—via an actor from the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines TailwindCSS base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with a green-and-cream palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with sections describing the school’s mission, vision, core values, and history using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/AcademicsPage.tsx: Displays academic information including curriculum, teachers, resources, schedule, subjects offered, and learning approach.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnnounceme: Provides an admin interface to create, edit, and delete announcements using dialogs and form inputs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays the admin dashboard with links to content management sections like announcements, events, staff, gallery, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEventsPage: Admin UI for creating, editing, publishing, and deleting events with a modal form and event CRUD hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGalleryPag: Admin page for uploading images to the gallery with progress tracking and publishing uploaded file IDs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin interface for editing and saving site contact settings using form fields and settings API hooks.
Admin UI to create, edit, and delete staff profiles via a modal, including bio, contact info, and publish status.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionsPage.tsx: Shows admissions information such as eligibility, required documents, and notices using cards and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays published announcements with loading and error states, formatting each announcement in a card layout.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information fetched from site settings and shows a contact form, with loading placeholders if data is not ready.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Fetches and lists published events with formatted dates, upcoming badges, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Loads and displays a gallery grid of published images with loading skeletons and error/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage hero section and previews of announcements, events, staff, and gallery items using public content hooks.
frontend/src/pages/StaffPage.tsx: Fetches and lists staff members with names, positions, bios, and contact info, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session-based parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including features, issues, admin allowlist notes, and a request to fix deployment and admin access problems.
